name: The Lechita Forest
description:
As a child my uncle would often tell me stories. One night as I lay in bed, I was feeling quite brave. I'd asked uncle to tell me a scary story. "A scary story? Are you sure?" He'd asked, quite surprised and perhaps even a little proud of the courage his dear nephew had shown. "Yes uncle!" I said, unaware of the gruesome tale to come. "Very well." replied uncle, adjusting himself at the edge of my bed as he pieced the memories together in his mind.

"In my home country, hidden from the maps there is a woodland my ancestors called, 'Lechita Forest'."

CURRENT VERSION 0.8b

Please record Gameplay! I'd love to see all your videos!

Short Game aprox. 10 - 20 minutes depending on GAMER SKILL.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Mouse Button - Open/Use

F - Flashlight

Q or E - Lean

Tab - Check Current Objective

All content is copyright free and safe for YouTube channels to upload.
